verses.name: Exodus 31:6
verses.text: And I, behold, I have given with him Aholiab, the son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan: and in the hearts of all that are wise hearted I have put wisdom, that they may make all that I have commanded thee;

verses.name: Exodus 31:7
verses.text: The tabernacle of the congregation, and the ark of the testimony, and the mercy seat that is thereupon, and all the furniture of the tabernacle,

verses.name: Exodus 31:8
verses.text: And the table and his furniture, and the pure candlestick with all his furniture, and the altar of incense,
